#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
 int t;
 long long i,j,num,n,k,tmp,rem,ans;
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--){
  scanf("%lld",&num);
  tmp = 0, n = 0;
  while(tmp < num){
   n =n+1;
   tmp = pow(2,n+1) - 2;
  }
  tmp = pow(2,n)-2;
  ans = num - tmp -1;
  char str[100000];
  k = -1;
  while(ans>0){
   rem = ans%2;
   k = k+1;
   str[k] = rem + '0';
   ans = ans/2;
   }
   j = n-k-1;
   for(i =1; i<= j; i++)
    printf("5");
   for(i =k; i>=0; i--)
   {
    if(str[i] == '0')
      printf("5");
    else 
      printf("6");
   }
   printf("\n");
  }
  return 0;
 }
